mails.subject: Training Program
mails.content:
About Invact Metaversity
A 16-week rigorous alternate MBA program designed to get you a job in a core business function of a high growth company. The program will empower you with crucial job skills and help you build a proof-of-work portfolio that will make you job-ready.

mails.subject: Empower your future at Invact
mails.content: We are creating an immersive learning experience for students around the world. Learn with your peers in a social setting and belong to a community. Experience the classroom from your couch.
